channel.title: ~b33 g00d's Simple Scripts~
channel.description: Hello, some of you may know me from sythe, but i got banned because they said i had 2 accounts, so they mistakenley baned me :mad: Any ways, here are my scrips and all of them are working. Please leave me some feed back, thanks. Oh and have fun with my scripts :)

item.title: ~b33 g00d's Simple Scripts~
item.dc:creator: @yohojo yohojo
item.description:
@yohojo wrote:

boberick:

b33 g00d, nice scripts, btw msge mopar that hes spamming on ur thread =p.

yes PLEASe get mopar here.
hell support me…
and the only people defenind b33 are the people who dont know ANYTHING about scrirpting

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:29, topic:11286”][quote]
Ok im still learning how to script with SRL give me a break, i don’t see any 1 with a working powercutter.
[/quote]

Alright…but just because yours works does not justify getting that account banned in a couple days, which is more time-consuming than switching to SRL.

It’s their choice to use my scripts, and ive never got banned and i’ve used them for hours.

Just because you haven’t gotten banned does not mean you will not, especially not after just hours.

Leave my thread. -Thanks

yohojo… if you don’t like my scripts, then get off my thread. Thanks

Yohojo get off my thread newb.

Please get off my thread. =-Z

Plus, you have the mentality of a 10-year-old. I’m getting pissed off just reading your posts. Yohojo gave you a way to update your scripts, a link to SRL, and even UPDATED YOUR STUFF FOR YOU WITH SRL, and you’re just being a dick, going, “Please get off my thread.”

If you cant take advice, especially from a more experienced scripter, then either dont post your scripts, because the leechers will use it on their mains and get banned, or ignore him, even though he’s trying to help you.

Then you call him a noob, but you’re the one using the built-in functions, not mouse movements from includes.

Although it was a shitty thing to do, to advertise his own powercutter on your thread, but you don’t have to get pissed off about it, especially when he was trying to help you.

And um… haven’t heard you say “ive never got banned” for three weeks now… is there any problem? Any perm bans handed out? Possibly? Hmm?

[/rant] (dont remember when i started)[/quote]
^smart guy^[quote=“wtf i sp4nk, post:30, topic:11286”]why does every1 think srl so godlike?[/quote]

Becase SRL is the only include that stills works/ get updated
Every other include is outdated and dont evenr eally count as includes =p
if ur scipting for rs
and dont wana get ppl banned with ur script(s)
u gota use SRL!
or make ur own inlcude

And b33 arre you even reading my posts?
im helping you
not rying to be rude
u said u cant find srl
i gave u link
i wated…
gave u time to conver but u didnt. so i even took like liberty to be nice AND CONVERT YOU SCRIPTS FOR YOU and you still just flame me.
your not gona get anywhere if you refuse to learn anything
stop trying to think ur so cool with these scripts anyone can make them

hers a poerminer and wooduter in one! omfg

treeorrockcolor:= 55555;

Being

end.

OMFG smeone please get someone with scipting knowledge here. b33if ur still LEARNING then learn hwo to convert this to SRL. you arent listeing to a work im saying.

Hers a pic of my old powercutters form:

OK just listen to this:
Im not trying to flame you
Im not trying to be rude
Im saying that these scripts are gona get people banned
So take them off right now.
Convert to SRL (takes like 5 mins each script)
and then put them back
After that people will be WAY less likely to get banned
Thats all im trying to say.
And its not my opion that ppl are gona get banned
its a FACT that jagex knows movemousesmooth and clicmmouse and can detect it easliy.

programming, irc, cars
